languages.text: "Зовемся мы просто Бригада Реты, а место — Лагерь Реты, вот и все. Мы — реколлигеры. Или, по-простому, мусорщики". {n}Женщина произносит последнее слово без какого-либо пренебрежения, а наоборот, с достоинством — так объявляют свою принадлежность к уважаемой гильдии или семейству.{/n}

"We just call ourselves Reta's Crew and this place is Reta's Camp, that's it. We're recolligers. Scavengers, in common terms." {n}She does not speak the word "scavengers" with any kind of disdain — on the contrary, there is dignity in her voice, the kind with which one would announce their affiliation with a respected guild or family.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Зовемся мы просто Бригада Реты, а место — Лагерь Реты, вот и все. Мы — реколлигеры. Или, по-простому, мусорщики". {n}Женщина произносит последнее слово без какого-либо пренебрежения, а наоборот, с достоинством — так объявляют свою принадлежность к уважаемой гильдии или семейству.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "It's something of a worker settlement. We just call ourselves Reta's Crew and the place Reta's Camp, that's it. We're recolligers. Scavengers, in common terms." {n}She does not say the word "scavengers" with any kind of disdain — on the contrary, there is dignity in her voice, the kind with which one would announce their affiliation with a respected guild or family.{/n}
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: “我们自称蕾塔班组，这个地方叫蕾塔的营地，就是这样。我们是回收专员，说得通俗点，就是拾荒者。”{n}她在说“拾荒者”这个词的时候，语气中没有一丝不屑之意，而是充满了尊严，仿佛是在宣布自己隶属于某个受人敬重的公会或家族。{/n}
languages.original_text: "We just call ourselves Reta's Crew and this place is Reta's Camp, that's it. We're recolligers. Scavengers, in common terms." {n}She does not speak the word "scavengers" with any kind of disdain — on the contrary, there is dignity in her voice, the kind with which one would announce their affiliation with a respected guild or family.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我们自称蕾塔班组，这个地方叫蕾塔的营地，就是这样。我们是回收专员，说得通俗点，就是拾荒者。”{n}她在说“拾荒者”这个词的时候，语气中没有一丝不屑之意，而是充满了尊严，仿佛是在宣布自己隶属于某个受人敬重的公会或家族。{/n}
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: «Nos hacemos llamar la tripulación de Reta y a esto lo hemos denominado el campamento de Reta, nada más. Somos recolectores. O carroñeros, como se suele decir». {n}No pronuncia la palabra «carroñeros» con ningún tipo de desdén: al contrario, su voz adquiere un tono digno, como si anunciara su afiliación a una familia o gremio de bien.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We just call ourselves Reta's Crew and this place is Reta's Camp, that's it. We're recolligers. Scavengers, in common terms." {n}She does not speak the word "scavengers" with any kind of disdain — on the contrary, there is dignity in her voice, the kind with which one would announce their affiliation with a respected guild or family.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Nos hacemos llamar la tripulación de Reta y a esto lo hemos denominado el campamento de Reta, nada más. Somos recolectores. O carroñeros, como se suele decir». {n}No pronuncia la palabra «carroñeros» con ningún tipo de desdén: al contrario, su voz adquiere un tono digno, como si anunciara su afiliación a una familia o gremio de bien.{/n}
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: 「私たちはレタのクルーと自称していて、ここをレタのキャンプと呼んでるだけです。それだけですよ。私たちはレコリガーです。俗に言う、ゴミ屋です」{n}彼女は「ゴミ屋」という言葉を侮蔑的な意味合いでは使っていない。それどころか、彼女の声には威厳があり、尊敬されるギルドや一族かとおもわせるような威厳がある。{/n}
languages.original_text: "We just call ourselves Reta's Crew and this place is Reta's Camp, that's it. We're recolligers. Scavengers, in common terms." {n}She does not speak the word "scavengers" with any kind of disdain — on the contrary, there is dignity in her voice, the kind with which one would announce their affiliation with a respected guild or family.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「私たちはレタのクルーと自称していて、ここをレタのキャンプと呼んでるだけです。それだけですよ。私たちはレコリガーです。俗に言う、ゴミ屋です」{n}彼女は「ゴミ屋」という言葉を侮蔑的な意味合いでは使っていない。それどころか、彼女の声には威厳があり、尊敬されるギルドや一族かとおもわせるような威厳がある。{/n}
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: "Wir nennen uns Retas Crew, und dieser Ort ist Retas Lager, ganz einfach. Wir sind Recolliger. Im allgemeinen Sprachgebrauch Plünderer." {n}Sie sagt das Wort "Plünderer" ohne jede Geringschätzung – im Gegenteil, in ihrer Stimme liegt Würde, als würde sie ihre Zugehörigkeit zu einer anerkannten Gilde oder Familie verkünden.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We just call ourselves Reta's Crew and this place is Reta's Camp, that's it. We're recolligers. Scavengers, in common terms." {n}She does not speak the word "scavengers" with any kind of disdain — on the contrary, there is dignity in her voice, the kind with which one would announce their affiliation with a respected guild or family.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wir nennen uns Retas Crew, und dieser Ort ist Retas Lager, ganz einfach. Wir sind Recolliger. Im allgemeinen Sprachgebrauch Plünderer." {n}Sie sagt das Wort "Plünderer" ohne jede Geringschätzung – im Gegenteil, in ihrer Stimme liegt Würde, als würde sie ihre Zugehörigkeit zu einer anerkannten Gilde oder Familie verkünden.{/n}
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: « On se fait appeler la bande de Réta, et vous vous trouvez au camp de Réta... C'est à peu près tout. On est des récupérateurs. Des charognards, comme ils disent. » {n}Elle prononce le mot sans le moindre mépris, bien au contraire. Il y a de la fierté dans sa voix, de celle que l'on éprouve lorsqu'on évoque son affiliation à une guilde ou une famille respectée.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We just call ourselves Reta's Crew and this place is Reta's Camp, that's it. We're recolligers. Scavengers, in common terms." {n}She does not speak the word "scavengers" with any kind of disdain — on the contrary, there is dignity in her voice, the kind with which one would announce their affiliation with a respected guild or family.{/n}

Il y a de la fierté dans sa voix, de celle que l'on éprouve lorsqu'on évoque son affiliation à une guilde ou une famille respectée.{/n}

languages.text: "Kendimize Reta'nın Tayfası, buraya da Reta'nın Kampı diyoruz. Geri dönüşümcüyüz biz. Amiyane tabirle hurdacıyız." {n}"Hurdacı" derken hor görmek niyetinde değil... Aksine saygın bir lonca veya soydan olduğunu duyururcasına ağırbaşlılıkla konuşuyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "We just call ourselves Reta's Crew and this place is Reta's Camp, that's it. We're recolligers. Scavengers, in common terms." {n}She does not speak the word "scavengers" with any kind of disdain — on the contrary, there is dignity in her voice, the kind with which one would announce their affiliation with a respected guild or family.{/n}
